name: No Loops 2 - You only need one
description: *** No Loops Allowed *** You will be given an array (a) and a value (x). All you need to do is check whether the provided array contains the value, without using a loop. Array can contain numbers or strings. X can be either. Return true if the array contains the value, false if not. With strings you will need to account for case. Looking for more, loop-restrained fun? Check out the other kata in the series: https://www.codewars.com/kata/no-loops-1-small-enough https://www.codewars.com/kata/no-loops-3-copy-within
